_sText:
Information:
------------

This map is a result of getting bored with a previous map 
and just fiddling around in Hammer for a few hours. I 
somewhat got the idea to make it into a FY sniper/fort map
after playing a very, very crappy fortress map earlier that
day. Despite the fact that the architecture was fairly
simple, it KILLED my framerate due to none of the brushes
being func_details. I decided that if nobody was making
anymore decent fortress maps, I might as well do it myself.

98% of all of the brushes you will see on this map are
func_details, and I got an averate framerate of 120FPS
using a ATi 9800 Pro 256MB. In the water area I still got
~90FPS, so I don't think this map will be too bad.


I know this map isn't all that great, but I think it will 
make for somewhat decent gameplay, especially if played as
a sniper map. By default, the design idea was to have it 
played with the AWP disabled, and force players to dive to
the bottom of the pool of water to retrieve one. But, it
doesn't have to be played that way at all. There are buy 
zones, so it should be rather flexible.

Additional Notes:
-----------------

  * 5 AWPS are located in the center of the map, down at
    the bottom of the pool structure (underwater).
 
  * 2 scouts also exist in the map, one on the roof of
    each fort, in the central position near the spikey
    spire.

  * Due the (near perfect) symmetry of the map, to better
    distinguish which fort belongs to what team, the
    terrorist side has been baked with red lights, while
    the counter-terrorist side has been baked with blue
    ones. This is also to pay homage to the map 2fort5,
    which was part of one of the greatest Quake1 mods
    to ever grace us with its awesomeness--Teamfortress.

  * There is one custom texture used in this map, and it was
    added to the BSP file using bspzip, meaning there are no
    textures needing to be unzipped, making it for easier
    installation. The custom texture is in the easter egg room
    located somewhere outside of the map.

Shoutouts & Contact Info
------------------------

This map was developed to be played on the After Hours Pub
(AHP) CS:S server. Visit their website at:
       
        http://www.ahpkicksass.com/

I want to give shout-outs to some people on the AHP server:

* Kaijin, for being a great consultant on Source mapping
* Killerpimp, for creating some awesome custom maps for
  the server already
* Devilman, for being one of the few people who idle on IRC
  as much as I do.

And some shoutouts to websites that helped me with mapping:

* The Valve Developer Community :: http://developer.valvesoftware.com/wiki/SDK_Docs
* Zombie's Optimizing Page :: http://www.student.kun.nl/rvanhoorn/Optimization.htm
* HL2World Knowledge Base :: http://www.hl2world.com/wiki/index.php/Main_Page
* Interlopers.net :: http://www.interlopers.net/index.php?page=hl2.htm

Other websites I want to give a shoutout to:

* Burning Souls Forum, a great NIN forum: http://www.burningsoulsforum.com/forum/
* Weltfunk v2.0, my VNV Nation forum: http://mandos.us/weltfunk2/

Personal contact information:

If you're really wanting to tell me how much my map(s) suck, feel free to drop 
me a line. Or visit my website. Whichever you find fit.

E-mail: kabojnk@gmail.com
Website: http://mandos.us/


This map can be found at FPS Banana under the name
fy_pain_fortress.


EOF
